channel.title: Jobs
channel.description:
Who is actually working on MoparClassic and getting this game off the ground?
theres quite a bit of XML work to be done, some client stuff and a lot of server-side content.
To let everyone know, i will only be working on server-side content and maybe a little client. i don't plan on experimenting with optimizations or tweaking the gameserver, just getting the feel right server-side.
that being said, what is others doing?

item.title: Jobs
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I need to get the client finished in MoparScape 4, and then get an actual beta up using the forum username integration and the actual MySQL database it will be running on. While running the beta, I’m going to have scripts that update the gameserver and loginserver and restart them every time a new commit is pushed to github that can be successfully built. Then server devs can see their fixes take place immediately on the public server.

By the way, for beta I got my hands on a 2gb OpenVZ VPS for cheap, it seems to work pretty well too.

Read full topic

item.title: Jobs
item.dc:creator: @Motaro Motaro
item.description:
@Motaro wrote:

I think that we should compile a list of things that need to done first.

I’d be interested in quests and broken NPCs.

Read full topic
